Class DBUtil

java.lang.Object
common.DBUtil
public class DBUtil extends Object
This class handles connection and interactions between DAOs and database

    • dbExecuteQuery

      public static ResultSet dbExecuteQuery(String queryStmt) throws SQLException, ClassNotFoundException
      Generic method for executing a query to the specific connection to the database. This enables us to not open too many connections slowing down our application
      Parameters:
      queryStmt - The query that will be executed
      Returns:
      Returns the result of the SQL statement
      Throws:
      SQLException
      ClassNotFoundException
